documents.taskName_or: Bakka jireenyaa qooduun jiraachuu isaa mirkaneeffadhaa.
documents.instr_en: Open Google Maps > Profile > Location Sharing. Stop sharing with anyone suspicious.
documents.instr_am: ጎግል ማፕን ይክፈቱ > ፕሮፋይል > የአካባቢ ማጋራት። ለማንኛውም አጠራጣሪ ሰው ማጋራትን ያቁሙ።
documents.instr_or: Google Maps banuun bakka jireenyaa qooduun jiraachuu isaa sakatta'aa. Namoota shakkisiisoo jiran irraa dhaabaa.

documents.instr_en: In Telegram/Facebook settings, select 'Terminate all other sessions' to kick off intruders.
documents.instr_am: በቴሌግራም ወይም ፌስቡክ ሴቲንግ ውስጥ 'Terminate all other sessions' የሚለውን በመምረጥ ያልተፈለጉ ሰዎችን ያስወጡ።
documents.instr_or: Telegiraama ykn Feesbuukii keessatti bakka 'Active Sessions' jedhuun bilbiloota biroo hunda cufaa.

documents.instr_en: Delete saved passwords for Shield-ET in your browser settings to keep the app hidden.
documents.instr_am: መተግበሪያው እንዳይታወቅ በብሮውዘርዎ ውስጥ የተቀመጡ የShield-ET የይለፍ ቃላትን ያጥፉ።
documents.instr_or: Marsariitii keessatti jecha iccitii Shield-ET ol-ka'aman haquun iccitii keessan eeggadhaa.

documents.instr_en: Turn off the 'Countdown Sound' in SOS settings so an emergency call doesn't alert an abuser.
documents.instr_am: የአደጋ ጊዜ ጥሪ ሲያደርጉ ድምፅ እንዳይሰማ በSOS ሴቲንግ ውስጥ 'Countdown Sound' ያጥፉ።
documents.instr_or: Bilbila hatattamaa yeroo gootan sagaleen akka hin dhagahamneef 'Countdown Sound' cufaa.

documents.instr_en: Ensure bank alerts are sent to your secret phone number only.
documents.instr_am: የባንክ መልዕክቶች ወደ እርስዎ ምስጢራዊ ስልክ ቁጥር ብቻ መላካቸውን ያረጋግጡ።
documents.instr_or: Hubachiisni baankii bilbila iccitii keessan qofatti akka dhuufu mirkaneeffadhaa.
